select product_no no, product_name name, product_summary summary, product_description description, product_mainimg mainImg, product_state state, product_type type, product_time time, product_season season from product
where product_type=#cloth#
where product_type=#place#
where product_type=#food#

select product_no no, product_name name, product_summary summary, product_description description, product_mainimg mainImg, product_state state, product_type type, product_time time, product_season season from product where product_no = #no#
select distinct product_type type from product
select min(pdetail_price) from pdetail where product_no=#no#

SELECT PDETAIL_NO NO, PDETAIL_DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, PDETAIL_NAME NAME, PDETAIL_PRICE PRICE, PDETAIL_NUM NUM, PDETAIL_SUMMARY SUMMARY, PDETAIL_IMAGE PDIMG, PRODUCT_NO FROM pdetail NATURAL JOIN PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #NO#
